name: Devastablance. Re - make
description:
WARNING! The game is completely fictional. Any coincidence of events or personalities with real ones is an accident. The game does not try to offend anyone and does not call for anything. There is blood in the game, not recommended for children under 13 years of age.

The devastabalance game is a pixel story game. The game is a linear plot with different missions.  The game was developed for 2 months by the Shvap team and the RazRaby team. The game takes place in a fictional world where there is a war between two warring civilizations - magicians and humans. The main character is the leader of a group of scavengers - people trying to return the world to its usual form. The main character sees in his dreams the memories of his father, who was a soldier who defended his hometown and his country. You can see the prologue below and in the game itself.

The world, once in balance between spiritual and material realities, has collapsed into the abyss of war. In a fit of anger, people used the most terrible creation of material reality. But because of the greed of the lords of spiritual reality, nuclear bombs hit not only the abode of spirituality, but also the material territory. Being the head of the scavengers association, which tries to reverse the consequences of the terrible mistakes of its ancestors, desperately trying to restore the balance of material and spiritual realities. People were divided into groups that adhered to their goals, ideals and philosophy. You have good public speaking skills and have little influence, but if it weren't for the huge mountain system around your camp, scavengers would no longer exist. You continue to believe in your opinion, promote it, prove that you are right and... But understand, because all this is a game and you are a speck of dust on the field of confrontation with established ideals, philosophy and opinions. But know, even a butterfly can change the world, so you can...

Coming soon.

You can support the development of subsequent parts of this game by donating.
